file_content.text: [Slicing this computer, you find two heavily encrypted files. One is labeled "Schematics." The other is labeled "Research."]
[This file contains blueprints for an Imperial starship.]
Registration: Dominator. Model: BSX-5. Class: Dreadnaught. Length: 600 meters. Armament: 28 turbolasers, 12 ion cannons, 2 tractor beam projectors. Reactor: Hypermatter annihilator.
Complement: 8 fighters, 2 shuttles. Capacity: 2,000 crew, 1,500 passengers, 500 troops.
Note: By request of Darth Jadus, all passenger quarters aboard the Dominator can be repurposed as prison cells.
[This file contains a message dated sixteen months ago.]
Synopsis: Imperial Science Bureau Special Project 62991A.
Device is not practical. Robust growth fails to counterbalance slow manufacturing (maturation?) process and limited power output.
No further research will be conducted. Enclosed image is for reference only.
